src.mill

Class MillRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.mill.MillRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rules

    public class MillRules
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rules
    MillRules implements Rules from src.Games and checks if the given move is valid.
    Author:
    Beg√ºm Tosun, Alexander Posch

      • threeInARow

        private static boolean[] threeInARow(PlayingPiece[][] stateToCheck,
                                     java.lang.String colour)
        Searches the game board for mills. Each field of the array returned by the method threeInARow(...) represents a certain row or column of the mill game board. Depending on if there is a mill on this certain row/column the value is true or false.
        Parameters:
        stateToCheck - PlayingPiece[][]
        colour - String
        Returns:
        boolean[]
